name: Petraus Project [Alpha]
description:
A friend has lost in an old school and you and your friends design to find his/her.  Something wrong is happening during the searching that you need to seek.

This is a very alpha of the project and has been stop for a while. Still I want it to be alive. This alpha can be play and end the demo part. You can support me by doing a little donation or be one of my pantheon at https://www.patreon.com/MistFox Thank you.
